class.name: OpenXRMetaPassthroughColorLut
class.brief_description: Uses the [code]XR_META_passthrough_color_lut[/code] extension to provide a color LUT (Look Up Table) for recoloring passthrough imagery.
class.description: Uses the [code]XR_META_passthrough_color_lut[/code] extension to provide a color LUT (Look Up Table) for recoloring passthrough imagery. See [method OpenXRFbPassthroughExtensionWrapper.set_color_lut] and [method OpenXRFbPassthroughExtensionWrapper.set_interpolated_color_lut]

method.name: create_from_image
method.description: Creates a color LUT (Look Up Table) from an image.
